name: Fighting Hero
overview: The just "Leon" meets countless challenges in this journey around the world. The software design of this game has made break through to the limitations of characters and colors. Players will be led to a fantastic action world where they can enjoy live actions and colors. "Leon" in this software program is equipped with various kinds of martial art skills, with which players can face different fights with full confidence. There are different sense of speed and visual effects of every stage in this game. Players shall learn how to operate skillfully in different stages, that is quite a challenges. Players will get extreme satisfaction operation this multi-stage video game. Mega Soft will bring you into the ultimate level of the video game world.
